title: Output gap forecast comparison UK from 2019 to 2023
summary: Overall OBR is rapidly increasing, IMF is rapidly decreasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. IMF, and lastly, 2. OBR.
The minimum Output gap about -0.2, occured at 2020 by OBR.
The difference of Output gap between OBR and IMF is smaller at Year 2021 compared to the Year 2020.

OBR reported the lowest Output gap about -0.2 in Year 2020
